entry.title: The rollercoaster of the past 33 days in lockdown

media:group.media:title: The rollercoaster of the past 33 days in lockdown
media:group.media:description:
While we've had to stay apart, there've been some shared experiences of frenzy, outrage and joy.
Join the 6pm team as they bring you the latest news from here and overseas Daily at 6pm on TVNZ 1 Get more at: https://www.tvnz.co.nz/one-news On Demand - https://www.tvnz.co.nz/shows/one-news-at-6pm Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/1NEWSNZ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/1newsnz Twitter - https://twitter.com/1NewsNZ

media:group.media:title: The Vaccine Race
media:group.media:description:
Many countries, like Australia, the United States, and especially China, are in a bio-tech arm race to develop – and own – a Covid-19 vaccine. It’s what the world needs right now, and what many brilliant minds are devoted to discovering. Across the ditch, an Australian company announced last week, that it hopes to begin human trials of a vaccine within weeks in what will be a battle for domination in how to stop the virus.
From Channel 9's "60 Minutes"
